# fisheriescape

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R functions to help with the fisheriescape project.

## Installation

Installation requires access to DFO internal drives and software. If you have those, you can install the development version of **fisheriescape** by using the code below, or by downloading and installing the latest package [build](https://github.com/JoleneSutton/fisheriescape/tree/main/builds). If you don't have all the requirements for installation, you can browse function code [here](https://github.com/JoleneSutton/fisheriescape/tree/main/R).
``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JoleneSutton/fisheriescape")
```
